title: health check api liveness probe
description: Test the /api/v1/health/live endpoint to verify it returns a 200 status with the correct JSON structure indicating the application is alive.

title: health check api readiness probe database healthy
description: Test the /api/v1/health/ready endpoint to verify it returns a 200 status with the correct JSON structure indicating the application is ready and the database connection is healthy.

title: health check api readiness probe database unhealthy
description: Simulate database connectivity issues and test the /api/v1/health/ready endpoint to verify it returns a 503 status with the correct JSON structure indicating the application is not ready and the database connection is unhealthy.

title: database manager initialize with ssl
description: Test the database manager initialization to ensure the database engine is created with SSL support and connection pooling optimized for Render PostgreSQL.

title: database manager health check query
description: Test the database manager's health check method to verify it successfully executes a SELECT 1 query and returns a healthy status.

title: database manager get async session
description: Test the database manager's get_session method to ensure it returns a valid asynchronous database session.

title: database manager close connections
description: Test the database manager's close method to verify it properly closes the database engine and disposes of all connections.

title: application settings database url transformation
description: Test the application settings to verify that a PostgreSQL URL starting with postgresql:// is automatically transformed to postgresql+asyncpg:// for asyncpg compatibility.
